name: Personalized News Digest
description: An AI‑driven service that curates articles from RSS feeds, learns a subscriber's reading history and interests, creates concise summaries, ranks them for relevance, and emails a daily briefing to each user.

tools.name: fetch_rss_feed
tools.description: Retrieves the latest entries from a list of RSS feed URLs and returns an array of article metadata (title, link, publish date).

feeds.description: List of RSS feed URLs to query.

max_items.description: Maximum number of items to return per feed (default 20).

tools.name: extract_article_content
tools.description: Downloads the HTML page of the supplied URL and extracts the main textual body, removing navigation, ads and boilerplate.

url.description: Direct link to the article to be downloaded.

tools.name: summarize_article
tools.description: Generates a concise three‑sentence summary of the given article text, highlighting the points most likely to match the user’s interest profile.

text.description: Full article text to be summarized.

max_sentences.description: Maximum number of sentences in the summary (default 3).

tools.name: rank_articles
tools.description: Scores a list of article summaries against a user interest profile and returns the top N summaries sorted by relevance.

user_profile.description: Profile containing the user's topics of interest.

top_n.description: Number of top articles to return (default 5).

tools.name: send_email_digest
tools.description: Emails the compiled list of top article summaries to the subscriber, using a subject line and a markdown‑formatted body.

subject.description: Subject line for the digest email.

body.description: Markdown‑formatted email body containing the article titles, links and summaries.

tools.name: update_user_profile
tools.description: Stores or updates a subscriber's interest profile with the supplied list of topics.

user_id.description: Unique identifier for the subscriber (e.g., email address).

topics.description: New list of interest keywords for the user.

examples.description: User subscribes to a daily technology digest; the assistant fetches articles, summarizes, ranks and emails the brief.
